markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wildborn Magic](/Feats.aspx?ID=978) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Access**
Mualijae ethnicity

</column>

---

You have learned to access the old magic of wild places. Choose one cantrip from the [primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4) spell list. You can cast this cantrip as an innate primal spell at will. A cantrip is heightened to a spell level equal to half your level rounded up.

<title level="2">Wildborn Magic leads to...</title>
[Wildborn Adept](/Feats.aspx?ID=983)
name: Wildborn Magic
